heading: Indlela yokubusisa iwayini lesidlo esingcwele iyachazwa. Cishe ngonyaka weNkosi wama 401 kuya kowama 421.

verses.txt: Indlela yokubusisa iwayini—Bheka, babethatha isitsha, bese bethi:

O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, siyakucela, egameni leNdodana yakho, uJesu Kristu, ukuba ubusise futhi ungcwelise leli wayini emiphefumulweni yabo bonke abaliphuzayo, ukuze bakwenze bekhumbula igazi leNdodana yakho, elachithelwa bona; ukuze bakhombise kuwe, O Nkulunkulu, Baba waPhakade, ukuthi bayayikhumbula njalo, ukuze babe noMoya wayo njalo. Amen.
